description.en:
### Suki no Toiki

1.) Like in the Eromanga / Ero Manga Mitai ni (エロマンガみたいに)

2.) Professor Sae Can't Hold Herself Back / Sae-chan Sensei wa Gaman Dekinai (さえちゃん先生は我慢できない)

3-4.) After Sex Reunion / Saikai wa Sex no Ato de (再会はセックスの後で)＋after
- A reunion of friends drinking their brains out. After most of the group has drunk themselves to sleep, Taneda wakes up and needs to use the bathroom, but when he gets there, Terada is already pulling down her pants.

5.) Hypno Play! / Saimin Gokko (催眠ごっこ)

6.) Wonder Collar (わんダーカラー)
A couple engages in some pet play after receiving a dog collar in the mail.

7.) My Little Sister Has Become a Maid / Zenryaku, Imouto ga Maid ni Narimashite (前略、妹がメイドになりまして)

8.) Together With You / Issho ni Ite yo (一緒にいてよ)
- Tetsu has been coming over every weekend to take care of his friend Aya, but this week she said that she would be going to college soon and he didn't take that well. He rejected her going to college and said how she and him couldn't be together if she went.

9-10.) Senpai's Weak to Pressure / Senpai wa Oshi ni Yowai (先輩は押しに弱い)＋after

11-12.) A Clumsy Love / Bukiyou Koi Moyou (不器用恋模様)＋after
- Lately, Ken Motoki has been plagued by a stalker who constantly sends him letters with no name or return address, making him unable to respond to them. That's when his sister's friend Tsukasa comes up with a plan: she will act as his girlfriend in public so that the stalker will think they are together and give up. 
However, after having going out a few times to no apparent effect, Ken voices his doubts about Tsukasa's plan during one of their "dates." To address his concerns, Tsukasa decides to give the stalker something far more exciting to watch.

13.) Don't Call Me Cute / Kawaii to Iwanaide (可愛いと言わないで)

14.) Sexcret / Kanchigai (姦違い)
- Kuroki is a loner, she sits in the back of class and doesn't speak to no one. She's your typical outcasted girls, she wears glasses and has short black hair, but she's got a secret, a sexcret.
